QuestData.Title: Running Out of Time
QuestData.Description:
I can feel the arcane surge growing as we speak.
I suspect there is not much time before the ruins make Rannan's J.A.M. look like a distant star in the night sky.
We have to get there and stop it.
Please be careful, $p.
Meet us by the east tower. We will assess the situation there.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Rannan and Lathos by the east tower.
QuestData.RewardText:
This is worse than we thought. The arcane energy is almost at its peak.
Something is hastening the process.

Objectives.Objective: Listen to Rannan's and Lathos' plan
